scripts.update: lerna run build --include-dependencies && yarn workspace @scrowl/editor run copy:assets
scripts.start:update: yarn run update && yarn run start
scripts.start: docker-compose --file containers/web.docker-compose.yml --env-file ./dev.env up --build -V && docker-compose logs -f -t server
scripts.stop: docker-compose --file containers/web.docker-compose.yml --env-file ./dev.env down && docker-compose --file containers/web.docker-compose.yml --env-file ./dev.env rm
